00049 class QicsStyle: public Qics
00050 {
00051 public:
00055     enum QicsStylePropertyType { QicsT_Int = 0, 
00056                  QicsT_Float, 
00057                  QicsT_QString, 
00058                  QicsT_QColor,
00059                  QicsT_Boolean,
00060                  QicsT_QWidget,
00061                  QicsT_QColorGroup,
00062                  QicsT_QPalette,
00063                  QicsT_QFont,
00064                  QicsT_QPixmap,
00065                  QicsT_QCursor,
00066                  QicsT_QicsCellDisplay,
00067                                  QicsT_QicsDataItemFormatter,
00068                                  QicsT_QValidator,
00069                      QicsT_QPen,
00070                                  QicsT_QicsRegion,
00071                                  QicsT_Pointer };
00072 
00076     QicsStyle();
00077

00082

00087     { return myProperties[prop]; }
00091     void setValue(int prop, const void *val);
00092 
00097     void clear(int prop);
00098
